animateColor.expression: If (((AE_InAlmUnackedCount( "#2" ) <> 0) AND ((AE_HighSeverityUnacked( "#2" ) >= 251) AND (AE_HighSeverityUnacked( "#2" ) <= 500))) OR ((AE_InAlmUnackedCount( "#7" ) <> 0) AND ((AE_HighSeverityUnacked( "#7" ) >= 251) AND (AE_HighSeverityUnacked( "#7" ) <= 500)))) Then 0 Else If (((AE_InAlmUnackedCount( "#2" ) <> 0) AND ((AE_HighSeverityUnacked( "#2" ) >= 501) AND (AE_HighSeverityUnacked( "#2" ) <= 750))) OR ((AE_InAlmUnackedCount( "#7" ) <> 0) AND ((AE_HighSeverityUnacked( "#7" ) >= 501) AND (AE_HighSeverityUnacked( "#7" ) <= 750)))) Then 1 Else If (((AE_InAlmUnackedCount( "#2" ) <> 0) AND ((AE_HighSeverityUnacked( "#2" ) >= 751) AND (AE_HighSeverityUnacked( "#2" ) <= 1000))) OR ((AE_InAlmUnackedCount( "#7" ) <> 0) AND ((AE_HighSeverityUnacked( "#7" ) >= 751) AND (AE_HighSeverityUnacked( "#7" ) <= 1000)))) Then 2 Else If (((AE_InAlmAckedCount( "#2" ) <> 0) AND ((AE_HighSeverityAcked( "#2" ) >= 251) AND (AE_HighSeverityAcked( "#2" ) <= 500))) OR ((AE_InAlmAckedCount( "#7" ) <> 0) AND ((AE_HighSeverityAcked( "#7" ) >= 251) AND (AE_HighSeverityAcked( "#7" ) <= 500)))) Then 3 Else If (((AE_InAlmAckedCount( "#2" ) <> 0) AND ((AE_HighSeverityAcked( "#2" ) >= 501) AND (AE_HighSeverityAcked( "#2" ) <= 750))) OR ((AE_InAlmAckedCount( "#7" ) <> 0) AND ((AE_HighSeverityAcked( "#7" ) >= 501) AND (AE_HighSeverityAcked( "#7" ) <= 750)))) Then 4 Else If (((AE_InAlmAckedCount( "#2" ) <> 0) AND ((AE_HighSeverityAcked( "#2" ) >= 751) AND (AE_HighSeverityAcked( "#2" ) <= 1000))) OR ((AE_InAlmAckedCount( "#2" ) <> 0) AND ((AE_HighSeverityAcked( "#2" ) >= 751) AND (AE_HighSeverityAcked( "#2" ) <= 1000)))) Then 5 Else If (((AE_InAlmUnackedCount( "#2" ) == 0) AND (AE_InAlmAckedCount( "#2" ) == 0)) OR ((AE_InAlmUnackedCount( "#2" ) == 0) AND (AE_InAlmAckedCount( "#2" ) == 0))) Then 6 Else 7

If ((AE_InAlmUnackedCount( "#2" ) <> 0) OR (AE_InAlmUnackedCount( "#7" ) <> 0)) Then 0 Else If ((AE_InAlmAckedCount( "#2" ) <> 0) OR (AE_InAlmAckedCount( "#7" ) <> 0)) Then 1 Else If (((AE_InAlmUnackedCount( "#2" ) == 0) AND (AE_InAlmAckedCount( "#2" ) == 0) AND (AE_InAlmUnackedCount( "#7" ) == 0) AND (AE_InAlmAckedCount( "#7" ) == 0)) AND ({#1.Sts.Ligado} OR {#6.Sts.Ligado})) Then 2 Else 3
